Message.Title: Google vs apple insider trades
Message.Msg: Apple imsiders sold enmasse when shares where between 580 and 690. The stock never saw the light of the day afterwards. Google insiders selling enmasse around 650-795, you think these insiders are not as smart as the apple insiders. Frankly the retail investor can fall in love with a stock and behave like a bozo.

Message.Title: This is huge - and will make your day
Message.Msg: Revenues approximately doubled last year as did earnings and expected again this year. Perfect size company (600 mil sales). Price needs to rise just to get to where the p/e of a fast growing company should be. It has a p/e of 22 and should have one of 40. By next year a p/e of 40 could easily be at 20 again. Not only should the price rise for a higher p/e but also it should rocket up with the expected fast rise in earnings. We could easily see the price triple in one year considering these items. SYMBOL: (AL) - a high profit airline leasing business. Company has billions of dollars in new jets ordered from Boeing and Airbus so obviously they expect a lot more business. I have 20 years experience evaluating hundreds of companies, this is one of the top 3 company stocks I have ever found. The chart looks good today also as the price just jumped on very high volume due to news that the company reported great earnings again and also leased 2 - Boeing 777's, and ordered 10 more Boeing 777's. Symbol (AL) Another interesting but more speculative stock is (edap). The company is big into ultrasound and they finished a study showing ultrasound works on prostate cancer without side effects like chemotherapy. The company is applying for approval with the FDA and it is expected to go through on a fast track because of the excellent results. This undiscovered company is priced at only $4. (edap)
